    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3309</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Uses of Blogging for English Teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauch Blogging für englische Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisations de Blogging pour les professeurs 
anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usos de Blogging para professores ingleses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi di Blogging per gli insegnanti inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήσεις Blogging για τους αγγλικούς δασκάλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicaciones de Blogging para los profesores 
ingleses</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG, and explains the advantages of using a blog in the classroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blogs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel, der im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN 
erscheint und beschreibt die Vorteile des Verwendens eines blog im 
Klassenzimmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article qui paraît dans le CHIFFON de 
magazine d'ETNI, et explique les avantages d'utiliser un blog dans la 
salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo que se publica no PANO do 
compartimento de ETNI, e explica as vantagens de usar um blog na sala 
de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo che è publicato nel PANNO dello 
scomparto di ETNI e spiega i vantaggi di usando un blog nell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο που εμφανίζεται στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών 
ETNI, και εξηγεί τα πλεονεκτήματα ένα blog στην τάξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo que aparece en el TRAPO del 
compartimiento de ETNI, y explica las ventajas de usar un blog en la 
sala de clase.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
